title: Sinners
description: Set in 1932 Mississippi, twin brothers return home only to confront a supernatural evil threatening their community.

title: Mickey 17
description: A disposable worker on a space expedition refuses to let his replacement clone take over his life.

title: The Amateur
description: A CIA cryptographer seeks revenge after his wife is killed in a terrorist attack, uncovering a web of conspiracy.

title: Last Breath
description: A deep-sea diver becomes trapped on the ocean floor, and his team races against time to rescue him.
